Welcome to Graph's documentation!¶

Algorithms.py¶

Module containing all graph algo i use in my Graph-rendering project

graph.Algorithms.BFS(graph: graph.Graph.Graph, node: int) → list[source]¶
Parameters

  • graph -- class object: The graph in which to run BFS

  • node -- int: number of node from we run BFS

Returns

list[] path

graph.Algorithms.DFS(graph: graph.Graph.Graph, node: int) → list[source]¶
Parameters

  • graph -- class object: The graph in which to run DFS

  • node -- int: index of starting node

Returns

visited: list: index of visited nodes, basically path

graph.Algorithms.gif(graph: graph.Graph.Graph, node: int, method, draw=False) → list[source]¶
Parameters

  • graph -- graph: class object: The graph in which to run method

  • node -- int: index of starting node

  • method -- function: method what used for visualisation

  • draw -- bool: Make step files during gif creation

Returns

list(imageio.class): result of imageio working with graph steps during method run
